column4: I've got to keep up...

column3: 一乗り20ルピーだよ
column4: Sand seals—20 rupees!

column3:
ヴァーサーク！

広大な ゲルド砂漠を渡るなら
スナザラシは必須！
一乗りたったの20ルピー！
盾がないなら50ルピー！
どう？乗ってかない？
column4:
Vasaaq! If you are hoping to cross the
vast Gerudo Desert, sand-seal surfing is
the way to do it!
It's only 20 rupees to rent one!
Need a shield, too? Just pay 50 rupees!
What do you say?

column3:
なに… そのしゃべり方？

もしや外のヴァーイ達の間で流行ってるとか…
column4:
What? Is that some kind of slang?


I wonder if it's just a thing outside Gerudo Town...

column3:
なに… そのしゃべり方？

もしや外のヴァーイ達の間で流行ってるとか…

と… ともかく ゲルド砂漠は広いからね
外に出るならスナザラシは必須だよ
必要になったら また声かけてよね！
column4:
What? Is that some kind of slang?


I wonder if it's just a thing outside Gerudo Town...


Anyway. The Gerudo Desert is vast.
You'd be wise to take a sand seal if
you're traveling beyond town.

column3:
なに… そのしゃべり方？

もしや外のヴァーイ達の間で流行ってるとか…

そ それより
お代が足りないんだけど…
スナザラシの世話も タダじゃないからね
これ以上は安くできないのよ ごめんね
column4:
What? Is that some kind of slang?


I wonder if it's just a thing outside Gerudo Town...


Hrm. It looks like you haven't got
enough to pay the rental fee.

You know, sand-seal care isn't cheap...
I hate to say it, but you can't rent one if
you can't afford it.

column3:
盾…持ってないんじゃない？
スナザラシに乗るためには盾が必要なの
盾もつけるなら50ルピーになるけど
どうする？
column4:
Oh, um... Do you not have a shield?
You need a shield if you want to go
sand-seal surfing.
For 50 rupees, I can give you a shield.
What do you think?

column3:

盾がないなら50ルピー！

column4:
Vasaaq! If you are hoping to cross the
vast Gerudo Desert, a sand seal is a
must! It'd be sealy not to have one!
It's only 20 rupees to rent one!
Need a shield, too? Just pay 50 rupees!
What do you say?

column3:
では気をつけて！
サヴォーク ザラシ！
column4:
Seal you another time!
Sav'orq!

column3:
ゲルド砂漠は広いからね
外に出るならスナザラシは必須ザラシよ

ふふ…外の流行も取り入れないとね
column4:
Anyway... The Gerudo Desert is vast.
It'd be a sealious mistake not to take a
sand seal if you're traveling out of town.

column3:
まぁ習うより慣れろって言うし
一度レンタルしてみたら？
column4:
They say practice makes perfect, so why
not just try for yourself?

column4:
Oh, um... I seal a problem... Do you not

For 50 rupees, I can give you a shield.

column3:
まぁ習うより慣れろって言うザラシ

column4:
They say practice makes perfect, so why
not just try for yourself? I doubt
anything will go sealiously wrong.

Vasaaq! You came! Sarqso! If you are

sand-seal surfing is the way to do it!
It's only 20 rupees to rent one!
Need a shield, too? Just pay 50 rupees!
What do you say?

column3:

一乗りたったの20ルピー！
盾がないなら50ルピー！ザラシよ？

20 rupees to rent one! Need a shield,
too? Just pay 50 rupees!

column3: まぁ 「習うより慣れろ！」 よ！！

アナタ まさか このゲルド砂漠を

column4:
Sav'aaq!


Oh, wow... Don't tell me you crossed the
Gerudo Desert on foot?

column3:
スナザラシは音に敏感な生き物なの

音を立てずに そ～っと近づかないと
すぐ逃げちゃうのよね
面倒だから ゲルドの人間は
ほとんどレンタルだけどね
column4:
Sand seals are especially sensitive to the
sounds around them. The trick is to
approach very, very slowly...
It's a pain in the neck, though, so most
Gerudo just end up renting one instead.

column3: 考えるより体で慣れろ…よ！
column4:
You know, the best way for you to learn
how to do this is by just doing it!

column3:
捕まえるのが大変だったら
うちのレンタザラシ屋で…って
アナタは ヴォーイだったわね…

ウチの店は ゲルドの街の中だから
残念だけど アナタにはレンタルできないわね
column4:
If you're having a hard time catching
one, come by my shop in Gerudo Town.
I rent out sand seals and...oh.
You're a voe...
My shop is inside the town walls, so
you won't be able to get in...

column3:
歩くと砂に足をとられて
大変だったでしょ？
砂漠ではスナザラシに乗って移動が
この辺じゃ常識よ
私は フラジィ
ゲルドの街でスナザラシのレンタルやってるの
お客様を乗せることのできるスナザラシは
まだまだ少ないから
こうやって外にいるスナザラシを調教して
育ててるってわけ
まぁスナザラシの事でわからないことがあれば
なんでも聞いて
これでもスナザラシトレーナーとしては
けっこう自信あるんだから
column4:
Must have been hard to walk through the
desert—especially having your feet sink
into the sand.
It's common sense to travel the desert 
with sand seals around here. 

My name is Frelly.
I run a shop in Gerudo Town where I rent
out sand seals.
Most people can't take the time to train
their own sand seals, so I rent out the
ones I've trained!
If you need to know anything about
sand seals, I should be your first stop.

column3:
スナザラシは
ゲルド砂漠だけにいる生きものよ
砂漠は砂に足をとられて
普通に歩くと大変だけど
スナザラシをうまく操れば砂漠を早く楽に
移動できるの
ゲルド族にとっては
なくてはならない存在よ
column4:
Sand seals are animals native to the
Gerudo Desert Gateway.

It's quite dangerous to cross the desert
on foot, but if you have a sand seal,
you'll breeze right along!
Obviously, sand seals are incredibly
important to the Gerudo people.

column3:
捕まえるのは大変だし
スマートにレンタルが今のトレンドよ！
ウチは大きなスナザラシの看板が目印だから
すぐわかるはずだし今度立ち寄ってみてよ
column4:
Catching them is really tough work. It's
much easier to save yourself some time
and just rent one instead!
My shop in Gerudo Town has a big
sand-seal statue on it. Just look for
that, and you'll find me!

column3:
へぇ… ハイリアのヴォーイでも
スナザラシを乗りこなせるのがいるとはね
どう？
私の旦那に ならない？
column4:
Wow... A Hylian voe who has mastered
sand-seal surfing?

I didn't think it was possible.
I'm speechless! I think I may need a
moment...

column3:
スナザラシの事でわからないことがあったら
何でも聞いてよ
こう見えて スナザラシトレーナーとしては
けっこう自信あるんだから
column4:
If you have any questions about
sand seals, come talk to me. I'm quite
skilled at training them!

If you need to know anything about

Most people can't take the time to train

スナザラシはゲルド族の
貴重な乗り物なの

レンタル屋がいるってわけ
こう見えて スナザラシトレーナーとしては

スナザラシの事でわからないことがあったら

column4:
Sand seals are an important means of
transportation for the Gerudo. 

But the sand seals in the wild haven't 
been trained. This makes them especially
tough to catch.
Many people find it easier just to rent
one...

And that's where a skilled sand-seal
trainer like me comes in!

Come talk to me if you have any 
questions about sand seals.

column3:
行きたい方向にスナザラシを誘導するだけ
そんなに難しくないわ
でも！

スナザラシに乗るには盾が必要だから
それだけは忘れないようにね
column4:
Steering a sand seal is really easy—
they'll go in whatever direction
you want. But!
You need a shield to sand-seal surf,
so don't forget about that.

column3:
捕まえたら後は行きたい方向に
スナザラシを誘導するだけザラシよ
column4:
Once you get ahold of a sand seal, all
you need to do is guide it in the
direction you want to go!

column3:
ごめんなさい ちょっと後にしてくれる？
そろそろ店を開けないといけないの
column4:
I'm sorry, but can you give me a minute?
I've still got to open up shop.
